thread.title: High Class Hotel that feels like a B&B
thread.title_full: High Class Hotel that feels like a B&B - Review of The Roosevelt Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: F263PLelizabethm
title: High Class Hotel that feels like a B&B
text: I felt like family, cared for and welcome. The suite was spacious, clean and well appointed. The customer service was head and shoulders above what I would have expected. I didn't need to be a high roller to be treated like one. All around impressive experience.
